flavorText: The way opened before him, and the dust of centuries stirred in the air.

foreignData.flavorText: Der Weg öffnete sich vor ihm, und in der Luft regte sich der Staub von Jahrhunderten.
foreignData.name: Geheimtür
foreignData.text:
Verteidiger
{4}{U}: Wage dich ins Gewölbe. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit wie eine Hexerei. (Betritt den ersten Raum oder rücke in den nächsten Raum vor.)

foreignData.flavorText: El camino se abrió ante él y un polvo centenario impregnó el aire.
foreignData.name: Puerta secreta
foreignData.text:
Defensor.
{4}{U}: Adéntrate en la mazmorra. Activa esto solo como un conjuro. (Entra en la primera sala o avanza a la siguiente.)

foreignData.flavorText: Le passage s'ouvrit devant lui tandis que la poussière des siècles emplissait l'air.
foreignData.name: Passage secret
foreignData.text:
Défenseur
{4}{U} : Aventurez-vous dans le donjon. N'activez que lorsque vous pourriez lancer un rituel. (Entrez dans la première pièce ou avancez jusqu'à la pièce suivante.)

foreignData.flavorText: La via si aprì di fronte ai suoi occhi e la polvere di secoli offuscò l'aria.
foreignData.name: Porta Segreta
foreignData.text:
Difensore
{4}{U}: Esplora il dungeon. Attiva solo come una stregoneria. (Entra nella prima stanza o avanza a quella successiva.)

foreignData.flavorText: 道が開き、何世紀もの埃が空気中を舞う。
foreignData.name: 隠し扉
foreignData.text:
防衛
{4}{U}：ダンジョン探索をする。起動はソーサリーとしてのみ行う。（ダンジョン探索をするとは、最初の部屋へ入るか、次の部屋へ進むことである。）
foreignData.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — 壁

foreignData.flavorText: 그의 앞에 길이 나타나며, 수 세기 동안 묵은 먼지가 공중에 흩날렸다.
foreignData.name: 비밀 문
foreignData.text:
수비태세
{4}{U}: 던전에 진입한다. 집중마법 시기에만 활성화할 수 있다. (첫 번째 방에 들어가거나 다음 방으로 전진한다.)

foreignData.flavorText: A passagem abriu-se diante dele, e a poeira de séculos encheu o ar.
foreignData.name: Porta Secreta
foreignData.text:
Defensor
{4}{U}: Aventure-se na masmorra. Ative somente como um feitiço. (Entre na primeira sala ou prossiga para a próxima.)

foreignData.flavorText: Путь открылся перед ним, и пыль веков поднялась в воздух.
foreignData.name: Потайная Дверь
foreignData.text:
Защитник
{4}{U}: углубитесь в подземелье. Активируйте только как волшебство. (Войдите в первую комнату или перейдите в следующую комнату.)

foreignData.flavorText: 道路在面前洞开，数百年的灰尘在空中飘舞。
foreignData.name: 密门
foreignData.text:
守军
{4}{U}：深入地城。只能于法术时机起动。（进入第一个房间，或前进至下一个房间。）

foreignData.flavorText: 道路在面前洞開，數百年的灰塵在空中飄舞。
foreignData.name: 密門
foreignData.text:
守軍
{4}{U}：深入地城。只能於巫術時機起動。（進入第一個房間，或前進至下一個房間。）

name: Secret Door
originalText:
Defender
{4}{U}: Venture into the dungeon. Activate only as a sorcery. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

rulings.text: To venture into the dungeon, a player moves their venture marker into the next room of the dungeon they are currently in. If they aren't currently in a dungeon, that player instead chooses a dungeon card from outside the game, puts it into the command zone, and moves their venture marker onto the first room.
Moving into a dungeon room will cause its room ability to trigger.
Once you resolve the last room ability of a dungeon, that dungeon is now completed and is removed from the game.
A player may only have one dungeon in the command zone at a time.
The player venturing into the dungeon chooses which dungeon they will venture into. They may choose a dungeon that they have already completed this game.
Dungeon cards are not part of a player's deck or sideboard. In both constructed and limited formats, players can use any dungeon card when they venture into the dungeon.
You can only move forward (well, downward) in a dungeon, never backwards or sideways.
Dungeons are removed from the game as a state-based action.
If you somehow venture into the dungeon while a room's ability is on the stack, you will continue on in the dungeon. If you're already in the last room, complete that dungeon and start a new one.

Choosing the dungeon or room to venture into is part of resolving the venture into the dungeon keyword action. Once that choice is made, players may not respond until after the appropriate room ability has triggered.

text:
Defender
{4}{U}: Venture into the dungeon. Activate only as a sorcery. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
